backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and per‑game high scores with access‑controlled queries and score submission.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file summarizing the purpose of all major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining color tokens, theming variables, and light/dark mode behavior.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling hash‑based routing, theming, layout, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to submit a display name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Header section showing the GameHub logo and introductory text for the hub page.
frontend/src/components/icons/GameCatego: Sprite‑based category icon component computing background offsets per icon position.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Sticky top navigation bar with links, branding, user info, and authentication button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main layout with header, footer, and content container wrapping child components.
frontend/src/components/leaderboards/Lea: Displays top scores and the user's best score for a game with loading states and rank icons.
frontend/src/gameRegistry.ts: Exports a registry of game definitions containing metadata like id, title, category, tags, and playability.
frontend/src/games/comingSoon/ComingSoon: Renders a placeholder card indicating a game is under development.
frontend/src/games/reaction/ReactionTime: Implements a reaction-timing game with state transitions, scoring, and score submission.
frontend/src/games/ticTacToe/TicTacToeGa: Implements a Tic‑Tac‑Toe game with win detection, turn logic, scoring, and submission integration.
frontend/src/games/word/WordScrambleGame: Implements a timed word‑scramble game with scoring, hints, rounds, and score submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthStatus.ts: Derives authentication status and formatted principal from the Internet Identity hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, scores, and leaderboards using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining color variables, theming, and UI utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AllLeaderboardsPage.t: Lists all playable games and links to their leaderboards.
frontend/src/pages/GameShellPage.tsx: Renders a selected game with metadata and leaderboard panel based on game ID.
frontend/src/pages/HubPage.tsx: Displays the main game hub with search, category filtering, and a grid of games.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the app’s UI theme.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, version, and feature list for the multi‑game hub application.
